MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH22 postcode area of Dalkeith. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.31am. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Buckie Road substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.12am on the 5th of March 2021.
